TITLE: Main Street is more optimistic this year even as inflation persists, survey says
SUMMARY: Small business optimism is rising, and owners are feeling better about the economy, even as inflation continues to pose challenges, the survey found.

TITLE: More than 100 years since the Black Wall Street massacre, Tulsa is creating a haven for entrepreneurs
SUMMARY: Amid the backdrop of Black Wall Street, groups are coming together to help uplift the next generation.

TITLE: A majority of America's small business owners support minimum wage increase, even as they worry about worker affordability
SUMMARY: Many states and cities are raising their minimum wage, and most small business owners agree with it, according to new CNBC|SurveyMonkey data.

TITLE: Economic confidence among small business owners hits highest level since Biden took office
SUMMARY: President Biden's approval ratings among small business owners remain low and entrepreneurs are far from rosy in their economic outlook, but confidence is up.

TITLE: The Taylor Swift economic effect has reached every town in America
SUMMARY: The Taylor Swift economy is in GDP and inflation everywhere Eras tour went nationally and globally. In towns across the US, there's also a booming microeconomy.

SUMMARY: The Taylor Swift economy is in GDP and inflation everywhere Eras tour went nationally and globally. In towns across the US, there's also a booming microeconomy.

TITLE: Small business optimism hits 11-year low as inflation fears won't go away
SUMMARY: The NFIB's survey showed a reading of 88.5, down nearly a point from February to the lowest since December 2012.

TITLE: Successful start-up founders offer advice for aspiring entrepreneurs: 'Embrace what makes you different'
SUMMARY: Successful start-up founders offer advice for aspiring entrepreneurs.

TITLE: Inflation fears among America's small businesses are rising again and their faith in the Fed is falling
SUMMARY: Small business owners say the economy is doing okay, but their inflation fears are rising again while their faith in the Fed is dropping.

TITLE: It's been a great run for Wall Street, but Main Street is feeling left out
SUMMARY: Small business owners across the country say a 2024 economy and stock market that have been chugging along have left them behind.

TITLE: How Baked by Melissa's founder turned a tiny New York City apartment kitchen business into a cupcake empire
SUMMARY: Baked by Melissa founder Melissa Ben-Ishay explains how she built her cupcake empire from subway order dashing to a following of millions on social media.

SUMMARY: Hiring your kids can offer tax benefits if you're self-employed. But first, you need to understand your state and federal labor and tax laws.

TITLE: Why half of all workers may struggle to get weight-loss drug health insurance coverage
SUMMARY: Small businesses employ half of American workers but the jobs often lack the health insurance coverage that big corporations offer, including weight loss drugs.
